title: Yu☆Gi☆Oh! Duel Monsters: Hikari no Pyramid
original_name: 遊 ☆ 戯 ☆ 王デュエルモンスターズ－光のピラミッド
sinopse:
A card that surpasses the Three Mythic Gods!? Kaiba has obtained a mysterious card, the "Pyramid of Light"! Meanwhile, Yugi hears an ominous premonition involving Kaiba and the other Yugi that grasps Kaiba's own life and the fate of the two Yugis. A dangerous duel has begun!

(Source: Tatsu no Kiba Productions)
